description: Become an agent of change now!
title: How do I become a U-Reporter?
content:
Would you like to have your voice heard? It is very easy to become a U-Reporter and takes less than one minute. The easiest option is to send us a message directly via to U-Report Indonesia in Facebook, and text "GABUNG" through Facebook messenger. 
 

 1. Access the U-Report Indonesia page in Facebook: [https://free.facebook.com/UReportindonesia/][1]
 2. Send a message to U-Report Indonesia in Facebook and text GABUNG through Facebook messenger. 


If you have a smartphone you can also join U-Report by downloading the U-Report Android Application by following this link : [Ureport Apps][2] (data charges may apply) 
 
Try to download the application with a WIFI network if you have access to one! 


  [1]: https://free.facebook.com/UReportindonesia/
  [2]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.ureport
